Text: This is my first torrent ever uploaded so let me know if I did something wrong. I found a rip of this audiobook online, but it was in 3 min chunk [over 300 of them], so I joined them in to one 16 hour mp3, used silence detection to break them down again, then did some tinkering and finally got them split into chapter. Hope you all enjoy!
